mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(login_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS login_day, COUNT(DISTINCT cust_id) AS user_count FROM login_history GROUP BY TO_CHAR(login_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY login_day ASC
SELECT c.cate_name AS category_name, COUNT(p.product_id) AS product_count FROM product p INNER JOIN cate c ON p.cate_id = c.cate_id GROUP BY c.cate_name ORDER BY product_count DESC
